text: Boychinovtsi (, also transliterated as Boichinovtsi, Boichovci, Boychonovci or Boychinovtzi)Town of Boychinovtsi, Boychinovtsi Municipality at Guide- Bulgaria.com is a town (град) in northwestern Bulgaria, the administrative centre of Boychinovtsi Municipality (), Montana Province (). It is near the city of Montana. As of December 2009, the town has a population of 1,648 inhabitants. Bulgarian National Statistical Institute - Bulgarian towns in 2009 ==References== Category:Towns in Bulgaria Category:Populated places in Montana Province
title: Boychinovtsi
